perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Company desires to obtain the right to use the name, likeness and endorsement of Peyton Manning (hereinafter called "Manning") in connection with the advertisement, promotion and sale of Company's "Products" (hereinafter defined); and

      WHEREAS, Manning has granted such rights to Pey Dirt together with the right to sublicense such rights.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Famous Fixins, Inc. desires to obtain the right to use the name, likeness and endorsement of Peyton Manning (hereinafter called "Manning") in connection with the advertisement, promotion and sale of Famous Fixins, Inc.'s "Breakfast Items" (hereinafter defined); and

      WHEREAS, Manning has granted such rights to Pey Dirt together with the right to sublicense such rights.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Products' is changed to 'Breakfast Items' without a clear definition in this section, while 'Products' is still defined later in the document. This creates confusion about which term is applicable and leads to potential disputes regarding the scope of the endorsement.

perturbation.original_text: 4.    Remuneration. (a) Within thirty (30) days following the conclusion of each Contract Year Quarter, Company shall deliver to Pey Dirt an itemized statement setting forth the total shipments of Endorsed Products during said Contract Year Quarter and, at the same time, shall pay to Pey Dirt a royalty with respect to such shipments as hereinafter provided.  Such royalties shall be based upon the actual invoice price of such shipments, exclusive only of shipping charges and sales taxes, and shall be at the rate of 8.5% of the total of said invoice prices with a minimum invoice price of $2.50 per box.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.    Remuneration. (a) Within thirty (30) days following the conclusion of each Contract Year Quarter, Famous Fixins, Inc. shall deliver to Pey Dirt an itemized statement setting forth the total shipments of Breakfast Items during said Contract Year Quarter and, at the same time, shall pay to Pey Dirt a fee with respect to such shipments as hereinafter provided.  Such fees shall be based upon the agreed upon price of such shipments, inclusive of shipping charges and sales taxes, and shall be at the rate of 5% of the total of said agreed upon prices with a minimum invoice price of $3.00 per unit.
perturbation.explanation: Multiple changes here introduce contradictions.  'Company' changed to 'Famous Fixins, Inc.', 'Endorsed Products' changed to 'Breakfast Items' (as changed earlier), 'royalty' is replaced with 'fee', 'actual invoice price' is replaced with 'agreed upon price'. Also, 'exclusive only of shipping charges and sales taxes' is replaced with 'inclusive of shipping charges and sales taxes' and the rate is changed from 8.5% to 5%. These changes create uncertainty about the method of royalty calculation.

perturbation.original_text: 16.   Indemnity.  Company agrees to protect, indemnify and save harmless Pey Dirt, Pey Dirt's agent and Manning, or any of them, from and against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments and costs whatsoever, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of, or in any way connected with, this Agreement, Company's default hereunder, the negligence, actions, errors or omissions of Company or any claim or action for personal injury, death or otherwise involving alleged defects in Company's Products, provided that Company shall be given notice of any such action or claim.  Company agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, general liability insurance and product liability insurance with limits no less than $3,000,000 and within thirty (30) days from the date hereof, Company will submit to Pey Dirt a fully paid policy or certificate of insurance naming Pey Dirt, Pey Dirt's agent and Manning as additional insured parties, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without written notice to Pey Dirt at least twenty (20) days in advance thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: 16.   Liability.  Famous Fixins, Inc. agrees to protect, indemnify and save harmless Pey Dirt, Pey Dirt's agent and Manning, or any of them, from and against any and all expenses, damages, claims, suits, actions, judgments and costs whatsoever, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of, or in any way connected with, this Agreement, Famous Fixins, Inc.'s default hereunder, the negligence, actions, errors or omissions of Famous Fixins, Inc. or any claim or action for personal injury, death or otherwise involving alleged defects in Famous Fixins, Inc.'s Breakfast Items, provided that Famous Fixins, Inc. shall be given notice of any such action or claim.  Famous Fixins, Inc. agrees to provide and maintain, at its own expense, general liability insurance and business insurance with limits no less than $1,000,000 and within sixty (60) days from the date hereof, Famous Fixins, Inc. will submit to Pey Dirt a declaration of coverage naming Pey Dirt, Pey Dirt's agent and Manning as additional insured parties, requiring that the insurer shall not terminate or materially modify such without electronic notice to Pey Dirt at least ten (10) days in advance thereof.
perturbation.explanation: Changed 'Company' to 'Famous Fixins, Inc.', changed 'alleged defects in Company's Products' to 'alleged defects in Famous Fixins, Inc.'s Breakfast Items', changed product liability insurance to business insurance, reduced limit from $3,000,000 to $1,000,000, changed delivery to sixty days and change notice period from 20 days to 10 days. 'Fully paid policy or certificate of insurance' changed to 'declaration of coverage', and 'written notice' to 'electronic notice'. Introduces conflict by altering the nature of the insurance required and the amount.
